item.title: The 2nd International Design Competition: SMART CITY+
1st Competition - FUTURE CITY: SMART DESIGN FOR POST-PANDEMIC WORLD
item.description: About Competition As an estimated 70% of the world population will live in cities by 2050, architecture, urban design, and planning against pandemic will become even more important in years to come.
